definition: A facility or structure designed for a specific purpose, often used to refer to a place where something is produced, stored, or processed. It can also refer to a financial investment or a system for generating electricity.

examples.german: Die Anlage des Parks ist sehr schön.
examples.english: The layout of the park is very beautiful.

examples.german: Er hat eine Anlage für Musikproduktion.
examples.english: He has a setup for music production.

examples.german: Die Anlage des Gebäudes ist modern und funktional.
examples.english: The design of the building is modern and functional.

examples.german: Die Anlage des Gartens wurde von einem Landschaftsarchitekten entworfen.
examples.english: The landscaping of the garden was designed by a landscape architect.

examples.german: Die Anlage des Tennisplatzes ist gut gepflegt.
examples.english: The condition of the tennis court is well-maintained.
